about_the_game:
STORY

STONED is a turn-based RPG about 3 stoners from the hood named Lil Bro, Big Bro and Cole who accidentally become possessed by the soul of an Ancient Cosmic Wizard. This leads to them finding out they have a prophesised duty to resurrect the Cosmic Wizard from the dead. But since they're too lazy to do all that, they decide to go on an adventure to find and collect 3 magical stones that can be used in a ritual to remove the Wizard's soul from them. Shenanigans ensue.

UNIQUE TURN-BASED GAMEPLAY

STONED features unique "pong-style" attack mechanics in its battle system in order to make the traditional turn-based combat more interactive and input based! You avoid enemy attacks by aligning yourself with their projectile and performing a certain action based on it's colour in order to deflect it!

OTHER FEATURES

  • Mix of traditional and unique turn-based combat mechanics

  • Party-based RPG mechanics

  • Unique and comedic story with some references to deeper themes

  • Exploration of new areas with lots of items to find and NPCs to talk to

  • Magical spells and other fantasy themes

  • Weed

A WORD FROM THE CHARACTERS!

COLE SAYS:

 "Please play this game so I can purchase some more loud"

DISCLAIMER: This game contains depictions and glorification of illicit drug use as well as addiction. However, Team Quivurr does not promote or stand for the use of substances illegally. This game is purely fiction and actions performed or glorified by its characters are not meant to be taken as social commentary or as any other sort of advice.
